title: a sans serif logo font
author: nialishanti

comments.content:
Almost impossible to match based on such a small sample and only three letters.

If the rough/distressed vibe I’m getting from it isn’t an illusion, then Dirty Headline might work:  
 [http://www.dafont.com/dirty-headline.font?text=SKY](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153800/http:/www.dafont.com/dirty-headline.font?text=SKY "http://www.dafont.com/dirty-headline.font?text=SKY")

If you are looking for something cleaner, Gothic No. 13 comes close:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/gothic-no-13/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153800/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/gothic-no-13/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/gothic-no-13/")
great thanks heaps, i think the distressed one is it. If you zoom in on the logo it has the little white speckles in the same place.
